title: Intrusive Thoughts
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, we get in our psychology bag to discuss “Intrusive Thoughts”. What do our most negative and disturbing thoughts say about who and what we really are? Should we be worried or let them fly? We share our thoughts and personal experiences.

#TheFriendZone is streaming LIVE tonight at 8pm EST / 5pm PST. Wednesday, March 30th. Are you coming? Join our Patreon to catch the link: www.patreon.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

The Black Business of the Week - Raye Raye x INH https://inhhair.com/collections/raye-raye-x-inh

Wellness Segment - https://www.imperfectfoods.com

THE FRIEND ZONE IS ON PATREON! Sign up now to catch our 4 spin-off shows (with audio AND video) plus our NEW Livestream Tour: www.patreon.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Have a GREAT day!
